extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Cisco Umbrella Virtual Appliance is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed software version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Which Cisco Umbrella Virtual Appliance version is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Migrate to a Fixed Release
extracted_playbook.description: Migrate Cisco Umbrella Virtual Appliance 3.2 and earlier to a fixed release to address the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version 3.3.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update Cisco Umbrella Virtual Appliance 3.3 to version 3.3.2 to address the vulnerability.

affected_products: Cisco Umbrella Virtual Appliance for VMWare ESXi and Hyper-V < 3.3.2
